categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order

nodes.text: A COMPNOR Regiment was a formation of the Imperial Army.

A COMPNOR Regiment was a formation comprised entirely of CompForce volunteers, modelled after a standard line regiment with the exception of security platoons. CompForce commanders believed that security platoons were an unnecessary addition to a well trained and loyal unit, a notion that did not endear them to the regular army.
